config.name: listeners
tooltip
config.desc: The tooltip for the button - can be a string or QuickTips config object

config.name: text
config.desc: The button text

config.name: renderTo
config.desc: The element to append the button to

config.name: hidden
config.desc: True to start hidden (defaults to false)

config.name: toggleGroup
config.desc:
The group this toggle button is a member of (only 1 per group can be pressed, only
   applies if enableToggle = true)

config.name: handleMouseEvents
config.desc: False to disable visual cues on mouseover, mouseout and mousedown (defaults to true)

config.name: menu
config.desc: Standard menu attribute consisting of a reference to a menu object, a menu id or a menu config blob (defaults to undefined).

config.name: enableToggle
config.desc: True to enable pressed/not pressed toggling (defaults to false)

config.name: handler
config.desc: A function called when the button is clicked (can be used instead of click event)

config.name: scope
config.desc: The scope of the handler

config.name: minWidth
config.desc: The minimum width for this button (used to give a set of buttons a common width)

config.name: disabled
config.desc: True to start disabled (defaults to false)

config.name: pressed
config.desc: True to start pressed (only if enableToggle = true)

config.name: template
config.desc:
(Optional)
An {@link Roo.Template} with which to create the Button's main element. This Template must
contain numeric substitution parameter 0 if it is to display the tRoo property. Changing the template could
require code modifications if required elements (e.g. a button) aren't present.

config.name: cls
config.desc: A CSS class to apply to the button's main element.

config.name: tabIndex
config.desc: The DOM tabIndex for this button (defaults to undefined)

config.name: iconCls
config.desc: A css class which sets a background image to be used as the icon for this button (defaults to undefined).

config.name: menuAlign
config.desc: The position to align the menu to (see {@link Roo.Element#alignTo} for more details, defaults to 'tl-bl?').

config.name: icon
config.desc:
The path to an image to display in the button (the image will be set as the background-image
CSS property of the button by default, so if you want a mixed icon/text button, set cls:"x-btn-text-icon")

config.name: tooltipType
config.desc: The type of tooltip to use. Either "qtip" (default) for QuickTips or "title" for title attribute.

config.name: clickEvent
config.desc: The type of event to map to the button's event handler (defaults to 'click')

config.name: repeat
config.desc:
True to repeat fire the click event while the mouse is down. This can also be
  an {@link Roo.util.ClickRepeater} config object (defaults to false).

config.name: type
config.desc: The button's type, corresponding to the DOM input element type attribute.  Either "submit," "reset" or "button" (default).
